sub_title: Urban Designer - Project manager Urban Development at Gemeente Tilburg
summary:
My diverse knowledge and experiences show that I am employable for different kind of spatial projects. My ambition as an urban designer is, to create together a high quality and sustainable environment to live in, perfectly integrated in its surrounding, with a high user value. I always try to explore the sites in person and if possible stay there temporarily, to get to know the context, the identity, to analyze and finally translate this into a sustainable plan for now and the future.   

To realize these ambitions I prefer to work together with other professionals from related fields to develop integral plans and increase my own knowledge as well. I am creative, enthusiastic and take initiative. I work hard, goal and result oriented. I assist where necessary and have experience with leading and initiating projects, also international. 

Professional knowledge: urban design, urban planning, policy, landscape architecture, architecture, historical analysis, favelas, deprived neighborhoods, urban farming, participation proces, water issues, sustainability, temporary/abandoned spaces, solar parks.

Competences: initiating projects, project management, committed, analytical, decisive, strategic, networking/communication, feasibility studies, out of the box, creative, innovative, organizing.

If you have a challenge for me, or if you want to work together with me, don’t hesitate to contact me!

projects.title: Favela você mesmo faz!
projects.description:
For a half year Studio Urban Sprinkle studied the public space and self-organised system of living in one of Rio de Janeiro’s communities (favelas), Complexo do Alemão. We were not only present to research, analyse and design our ideas, but also to see whether we could already contribute with some small interventions to the community. And this happened; together with local residents and entrepreneurs we improved and created public spaces. Finally studio Urban Sprinkle organised together with Ben Stokke (masterstudent architecture) a workshop for the residents, which resulted in interesting visions and ideas. We have translated these results into scenarios for the community and presented these together with the former interventions and a model, for two months in the exhibition space of Barraco#55, a local cultural organisation in the community. 
This project will be continued.

projects.title: Public Space Strategy for North Transvaal, The Hague
projects.description:
‘I wish this WAS…Common scenarios for Transvaal’ - from a monologue to an urban play.

A four days intense international workshop which was held by Urbego. 25 Young planners from 20 different countries were selected to work out strategic guidance for the The Hague housing association - Staedion, in order to help them to improve the housing situation in the multicultural area of Transvaal in the city of The Hague. With my team we worked out a strategy to improve the public space. The final results were then presented in the International Housing Conference, held by the International Federation for Housing and Planning in The Hague.

projects.title: Exploring Urban Farming in Eindhoven
projects.description: Urban farming is getting more popular and in the city of Eindhoven are already a lot of initiatives. Urban farming is a way for urban citizens to produce local food. It could be a first step in creating small, local and partly self-supporting networks and in addition it creates opportunities for a bigger biodiversity and improvement of the ecological and hydrological life of the city. Therefore I researched the possibilities of urban farming in the city of Eindhoven, together with Studio Synthese. What kind of initiatives are there already, what parties are involved and what are the problems the municipality is facing? We came up with suggestions for the municipality.

contributors.headline: Urban Designer - Project manager Urban Development at Gemeente Tilburg
Projectleider Grote Oogst (verduurzamen & vergroenen bedrijventerreinen) at Provincie Noord-Brabant

projects.title: Inspiration book A2 Viaduct - Oirschotsedijk Eindhoven
projects.description: Viaducts in general aren’t very pleasant places to stay, but on the other hand they often offer a huge amount of space to transform it into a unique and pleasant place. This is also the case for the viaduct that leads the highway A2 across a recreational route. Together with Studio Synthese and local residents we studied the future role and function of the A2 viaduct. How can you extend the recreational route under the viaduct? And what can you do with this viaduct in terms of design and function? How can you prevent the viaduct from being a dark and unpleasant interruption? We finally came up with four scenarios for a pleasant and attractive viaduct which also contributes to its surroundings.

contributors.headline: Urban Designer - Project manager Urban Development at Gemeente Tilburg

projects.title: Design Sessions Public Space, Stadswerk
projects.description: Design contest: OOR 2012 (design sessions for the public space) organized by Vereniging Stadswerk and the municipality of Eindhoven. The municipality of Eindhoven requested out of the box solutions for the so called intersections that interrupt the continuity of the Green Corridor. We presented three proposals for three different intersections along the route. Our solutions convinced the jury. They appreciated our analytical approach and how we managed to translate this into concept and design. We were selected to present our solutions at a local festival at the Fruitgardens of Philips, for a group of 100 people who all had something to do with the Green Corridor. 2nd place, ‘Poorten naar het Groene Woud’.

projects.title: Feasibility study: ‘Pluk de stad!’ chances and (im)possibilities for urban farming in a (semi)professional way.
projects.description: More and more professionals are convinced that urban farming is the solution to produce local and sustainable food in the city and that it is a possible solution to resolve the problem of the high amount of vacant buildings in our cities, in combination with the use of LED-techniques. But is this true, did someone ever researched this topic? Is it possible to develop a business plan for the concept of urban farming which is profitable, wherein a substantial amount of food will be produced in the city and will be sold for a competitive price on the market? Together with Studio Synthese and UrbanCulture.nu Urban Sprinkle researched the chances and (im)possibilities of urban farming in a (semi) professional way. We came to remarkable conclusions!

projects.title: Urban CampScape
projects.description:
For the first time it was possible to stay overnight as an urban adventurer under the viaduct ‘Strijps Bultje’, at Strijp-S; the design heart of Eindhoven. The space underneath the viaduct was the stage for a city-campsite and the hangout of the Dutch Design Week. The choice for this location wasn’t coincidental: ‘Strijps Bultje’ is an underexposed, but at the same time much discussed space in Eindhoven, full of potential. It also forms one of the intersections on the – still to develop – Green Corridor: the lush green connection between Eindhoven and the green forest.

Through the Urban CampScape and all the activities attached to it, the potential of the place and the roll she can play in the city has been researched. By working bottom-up with local parties and citizens, Urban CampScape tried to accomplish a certain degree of social sustainability. It was a showcase of what temporary art, urban design and events can mean for a city and how a temporary project can reach a lasting, positive contribution to the place and its surroundings.

projects.title: Living with water - 5th IABR Rotterdam
projects.description: We researched the future of the Veneto region in a multidisciplinary team. What is the future of the Veneto region in 2100, given the threats posed by rising sea levels, heavy rainfall, floods and drought? The Monti Lessini creeks form one of the three case studies of this project. They lie in between the ridges of Verona and Vicenza. A corridor of heavy infrastructure and dense construction formed by the A4 highway, the railway, industrial activity and settlements cuts them. The danger linked to the creeks is well known: the ‘areas’ heavy rainfall and the steepness of its valleys make the creeks a constant threat, for they often overflow due to uncontrollable amounts of rainwater and eroded sediment. The scenario proposed suggests creating north-south buffers along the creeks, that would make room both for the excess rainwater and for hosting basins, wetlands and woods. Living with water has been exposed at the 5th International Architectural Biennale in Rotterdam.

profile_positions.title: Urban Designer - Project manager Urban Development

profile_positions.description:
CroonenBuro5 is an international operating consultancy firm for architecture, urbanism & landscape and spatial planning. CroonenBuro5 is a subsidiary company of the engineering company AnteaGroup. I have been working here as an urban designer and project manager in the field of urban design, public space and landscape. I have been working on all-round plans and designs at different scales; from large visions to individual designs. I worked at the intersection where landscape, urbansim, policy and architecture meet. I was also the intercessor for international projects and solar parks.

A few projects I have been working on:
-	Masterplan for a new indoor swimming pool, sports hall and scouting building for sport park Den 
        Donk in Oisterwijk(NL)
-      Vision for the historic centre of Tiel (NL)
-      Advise for a residential area existing of 18 houses at the Landsmeerderdijk in Amsterdam (NL)
-      Masterplan for the waterfront and centre in Bocholt (BE)
-      Masterplan for the public space in front of the trains station Kontich - Lint (BE)
-      Urban design for a new residential area in Echt and Schinveld (NL)
-      Landscape design for various solar parks in the province of Noord-Holland (NL)
-      Urban Design for a housing project in Oosterwold, Almere (NL)
profile_positions.title: Urban designer, project manager at CroonenBuro5 - Antea Group

profile_positions.description:
Young office for design, research and planning for urban spaces. The studio stimulates and facilitates urban development, she exposes and unravels spatial issues, using integral, strategic and bottom-up approaches.
Our philosophy is that every space has potential. Solutions and designs are known for their social engagement, are practical, simple but innovative, often using a bottom-up approach. Working multidisciplinary, combing the skills of related fields, like architects, anthropologists, landscape architects, planners. We involve local citizens and local parties, use their expertise and create opportunities for them in the society. The studio uses urban design as a strategy to accomplish an ambitious output and a maximum effect on the livability and urban development.

www.urbansprinkle.com

profile_positions.description: Organization of OOR 2013: design sessions for the public space, organized by Vereniging Stadswerk. Organizing OOR means searching for a municipality/client, formulating the assignment, composing the jury etc. The design sessions are for students as well as for professionals. Students have the opportunity to work on a real case, for a municipality for example and professionals have the opportunity to lead this project for their team in these four days. Often municipalities give the winning teams the chance to continue developing their design.

volunteer_experiences.description: Estrela da Favela is a school in one of the favela's in Rio de Janeiro, founded by a Brazilian woman and Dutch man. I teach children in the age of 4 - 14 years, in general mathematics and English, but I also teach Portuguese, help them writing and reading as their education is way behind. Also I am helping to set up an urban farming project behind the school, not only to teach children about healthy food and nature, but also to improve the public space with more green in the dense favela.
